profile.name: David Layardi
profile.headline: Staff Platform Engineer | Kubernetes | Cloud Infrastructure
profile.about:
Experienced platform engineer with a passion for building scalable infrastructure. Specializing in Kubernetes, DevOps practices, and cloud-native technologies. Proven track record of designing and implementing robust platform solutions that enable development teams to ship faster and more reliably.

Key areas of expertise:
• Platform Engineering & Infrastructure as Code
• Kubernetes & Container Orchestration
• CI/CD Pipeline Design & Implementation
• Cloud Architecture (AWS, GCP, Azure)
• Observability & Monitoring

Always excited to tackle complex technical challenges and mentor team members.

currentPosition.title: Staff Platform Engineer
currentPosition.description:
Leading platform engineering initiatives to improve developer experience and operational efficiency. Responsibilities include:
• Architecting and maintaining Kubernetes infrastructure serving 100+ microservices
• Designing GitOps workflows with ArgoCD for declarative deployments
• Building self-service platforms to reduce deployment time by 70%
• Implementing observability stack (Prometheus, Grafana, Loki)
• Mentoring junior engineers on platform best practices
